## Test

This is a simple test.

```{r cars, echo=TRUE}
summary(cars)
ggplot(cars, aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  labs(title = "Speed vs Distance", x = "Speed (mph)", y = "Distance (ft)")
```
